title: Hedging Strategy Analysis
description: A portfolio manager wants to evaluate different hedging strategies for a wind farm to mitigate price volatility.

tasks.description: Model the wind farm's expected generation profile for the next 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces an hourly generation forecast.

tasks.description: Simulate potential revenue under three different hedging strategies: 1) no hedging, 2) 50% fixed-price PPA, 3) 80% collar (cap and floor).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs simulations and provides a distribution of revenue outcomes for each strategy.

tasks.description: Compare the strategies based on expected revenue, risk (standard deviation), and worst-case outcome.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary table and a recommendation for the most suitable strategy.
